code: import{SET_MAIN_STREAM,ADD_PARTICIPANT,SET_USER,REMOVE_PARTICIPANT,UPDATE_USER,UPDATE_PARTICIPANT}from"./actiontypes";export var setMainStream=function setMainStream(stream){return{type:SET_MAIN_STREAM,payload:{mainStream:stream}};};export var setUser=function setUser(user){return{type:SET_USER,payload:{currentUser:user}};};export var addParticipant=function addParticipant(user){return{type:ADD_PARTICIPANT,payload:{newUser:user}};};export var updateUser=function updateUser(user){return{type:UPDATE_USER,payload:{currentUser:user}};};export var updateParticipant=function updateParticipant(user){return{type:UPDATE_PARTICIPANT,payload:{newUser:user}};};export var removeParticipant=function removeParticipant(userId){return{type:REMOVE_PARTICIPANT,payload:{id:userId}};};
